Detailed Description

A View that displays an image in the viewport as the image is rendered.

Typically, developers should not need to use this class. The Dz3DViewRenderHandler class uses a DzRenderView to perform rendering to the viewport, and should provide all the functionality necessary for custom render operations to the viewport.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

int  xOffset,
int  yOffset,
const QString &  name = QString::null 
)

Constructor. Creates a new render view for the given viewport. The render view takes a 'screen shot' of the viewport to use as a starting point for the render operation.
